content: y d aya s esigns quick and easy baby blanket a pattern for beginners & those who need to make a baby gift asap a quick and easy baby blanket for the minimalist knitter and gift receiver this blanket knits up fast looks & feels beautiful is easy enough to do while watching tv and will be well received as it is machine washable… because in reality which new mother wants a baby blanket you can t throw in with a load of dirty baby clothes the multihued yarn makes this blanket look more detailed & complicated than it is while the simplicity of this pattern does not compete with the natural beauty of the yarns complexion abbreviations blanket pattern co cast on co 53sts 73sts *note if you tend to co tight sts stiches look on youtube for tutorial for double needle bobble bind off cast on method if unsure how you co use this rs right side method suggested yarn row 1-6 knit creating a garter stich boarder bernat baby blanket row 7 knit 3 purl to last 3 sts knit 3 color used for this blanket - little sand castle row 8 knit newborn 3 skeins infant/toddler 4 skeins continue row 7-8 until blanket measures 26 36 needles 32 circular needle size us 11 8mm knit the next 6 row creating a garter stitch boarder gauge 8sts x 13sts = 4 x 4 bobble loosely *note if you tend to bobble tight look on youtube for tutorial for a stretch bind off if unsure how you bobble use this method finished sizes newborn co 53 sts 26 5 x 28 weave in all ends block by rinsing in cool water infant/toddler co 73sts 36 5 x 38 & lay flat to dry
